title: Cleavages in the UK and Mexico

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true about the effects of cleavages in two course countries?

choices.label: Regional cleavages in both Iran and the United Kingdom have resulted in groups successfully gaining independence.
Religious cleavages have led to significant separatist movements in both Nigeria and Mexico, resulting in a military response from the state.
Regional cleavages have resulted in demands for greater autonomy and independence in the United Kingdom, whereas in Mexico, regional cleavages have only resulted in demands for greater autonomy.
Ethnic cleavages have not resulted in conflict in China and Russia because the state has given fair representation in government to these groups.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with different political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
